analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a static SVG placeholder icon representing a chat or conversation.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, inline SVG placeholder graphic for chat interfaces or chat-related UI states.

Components.name: PlaceholderChat
Components.description: A presentational component with no interactivity or internal state; its sole responsibility is to display the chat SVG icon.

Dependencies: CSS variable `--black` (used for the semi-transparent path fill)
Notes: No <script> or <style> blocks—purely a template component.
All styling is controlled via external/global CSS classes and variables.
SVG dimensions are fixed at 112×112, with a viewBox of 0 0 112 112.
